edu.harvard.util.gui

Class DefaultGraphDecorator<N extends Node<N,E>,E extends Edge<N>,S extends SummaryNode<N,E,S,G>,G extends Graph<N,E,S,G>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.harvard.util.gui.DefaultGraphDecorator<N,E,S,G>
  • Type Parameters:
    N - the node type
    E - the edge type
    S - the summary node type
    G - the graph type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    GraphDecorator<N,E,S,G>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PASSDecorator

    public class DefaultGraphDecorator<N extends Node<N,E>,E extends Edge<N>,S extends SummaryNode<N,E,S,G>,G extends Graph<N,E,S,G>>
extends java.lang.Object
implements GraphDecorator<N,E,S,G>
    The default graph decorator
    Author:
    Peter Macko
